SELECT /* MDMC0010.SEARCH00 인쇄 개별청약 조회 */ '0' CHEK_FILD /*체크박스*/ ,A.YEAR_MNTH /*년월*/ ,A.SEQX_FILD /*일련번호*/ ,A.CUST_CODE /*광고주코드*/ ,B.CUST_NAME /*광고주명*/ ,A.CTIM_CODE /*광고주팀코드*/ ,H.CUST_NAME CTIM_NAME /*광고주팀명*/ ,A.BRND_CODE /*브랜드코드*/ ,C.BRND_NAME /*브랜드명*/ ,A.MEDX_CODE /*청구지코드*/ ,D.CUST_NAME MEDX_NAME /*청구지명*/ ,A.RMED_CODE /*매체코드*/ ,E.CUST_NAME RMED_NAME /*매체명*/ ,A.MEDX_FLAG /*매체구분*/ ,A.APLY_DATE /*적용일자*/ ,A.MATT_NAME /*소재명*/ ,A.EMPL_CODE /*사원코드*/ ,SF_GET_EMPLNAME(A.EMPL_CODE) AS EMPL_NAME /*사원명*/ ,A.DEPT_CODE /*부서코드*/ ,G.DEPT_NAME /*부서명*/ ,A.PUBL_DATE /*게재일*/ ,A.MNDY_FLAG /*월일간구분*/ ,A.PUBL_PAGE /*광고페이지*/ ,A.COLR_DEGR /*색도*/ ,A.PUBL_FACE /*게재면*/ ,A.STDR_CTMT /*규격_CM*/ ,A.STDR_STEP /*규격_단*/ ,A.STDR_ETCX /*규격_기타*/ ,A.AMNT_FILD /*광고비*/ ,A.COMI_FILD /*수수료*/ ,A.COMI_RATE /*수수료율*/ ,A.TRTX_FLAG /*위수탁부가세유무*/ ,A.CMTX_FLAG /*수수료부가세유무*/ ,A.TRTR_NUMB /*위수탁거래명세서번호*/ ,A.TRTX_NUMB /*위수탁세금계산서번호*/ ,A.TRCH_NUMB /*위수탁임시전표번호*/ ,A.CMTR_NUMB /*수수료거래명세서번호*/ ,A.CMTX_NUMB /*수수료세금계산서번호*/ ,A.CMCH_NUMB /*수수료임시전표번호*/ ,A.MEMO_FILD /*비고*/ ,A.AORX_FLAG /*AOR구분*/ ,A.INST_USID /*입력자*/ ,SUBSTR(A.INST_DATE,1,10) INST_DATE /*입력일*/ ,A.UPDT_USID /*수정자*/ ,A.UPDT_DATE /*수정일*/ ,A.PTAD_FLAG /*인쇄광고구분*/ ,A.MNDX_FLAG /*잡지구분*/ FROM MD_PTMDXM A LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM B ON A.CUST_CODE = B.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_BRNDXM C ON A.BRND_CODE = C.BRND_CODE AND A.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM D ON A.MEDX_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CUSTXM E ON A.RMED_CODE = E.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_DEPTXM G ON TRIM(A.DEPT_CODE) = TRIM(G.DEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN MD_CUSTXM H ON A.CTIM_CODE = H.CUST_CODE
A.YEAR_MNTH >= #YEAR_MNTH# /* 년월 */
A.YEAR_MNTH <= #YEAR_MNTH00# /* 년월 */
A.CUST_CODE LIKE '%' || #CUST_CODE# || '%' /* 광고주코드 */
B.CUST_NAME LIKE '%' || #CUST_NAME# || '%' /* 광고주명 */
A.BRND_CODE LIKE '%' || #BRND_CODE# || '%' /* 브랜드코드 */
A.RMED_CODE LIKE '%' || #RMED_CODE# || '%' /* 매체코드 */
A.MEDX_CODE LIKE '%' || #MEDX_CODE# || '%' /* 청구지코드 */
A.MEDX_FLAG LIKE '%' || #MEDX_FLAG# || '%' /* 매체구분 */
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(A.YEAR_MNTH),TO_NUMBER(A.SEQX_FILD)

SELECT /* MDMA0030.SEARCH01 광고주목록 가져오기 */ A.CUST_CODE /* 광고주코드 */ , A.CUST_NAME /* 거래처명 */ , A.CUST_NAME AS CLIENT_NAME /* 거래처명 */ , ' ' AS USEX_CODE /* NULL */ FROM TA_CUSTXM A LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXD B ON A.CUST_CODE = B.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND B.CUCL_CODE = 'FA260110'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MD_PTMDXM ( /* MDMC0010.SAVE00 인쇄 개별청약 저장 */ YEAR_MNTH /*년월*/ ,SEQX_FILD /*일련번호*/ ,CUST_CODE /*광고주코드*/ ,CTIM_CODE /*광고주팀코드*/ ,BRND_CODE /*브랜드코드*/ ,MEDX_CODE /*청구지코드*/ ,RMED_CODE /*매체코드*/ ,MEDX_FLAG /*매체구분*/ ,APLY_DATE /*적용일자*/ ,MATT_NAME /*소재명*/ ,EMPL_CODE /*사원코드*/ ,DEPT_CODE /*부서코드*/ ,PUBL_DATE /*게재일*/ ,MNDY_FLAG /*월일간구분*/ ,PUBL_PAGE /*광고페이지*/ ,COLR_DEGR /*색도*/ ,PUBL_FACE /*게재면*/ ,STDR_CTMT /*규격_CM*/ ,STDR_STEP /*규격_단*/ ,STDR_ETCX /*규격_기타*/ ,AMNT_FILD /*광고비*/ ,COMI_FILD /*수수료*/ ,COMI_RATE /*수수료율*/ ,TRTX_FLAG /*위수탁부가세유무*/ ,CMTX_FLAG /*수수료부가세유무*/ ,TRTR_NUMB /*위수탁거래명세서번호*/ ,TRTX_NUMB /*위수탁세금계산서번호*/ ,TRCH_NUMB /*위수탁임시전표번호*/ ,CMTR_NUMB /*수수료거래명세서번호*/ ,CMTX_NUMB /*수수료세금계산서번호*/ ,CMCH_NUMB /*수수료임시전표번호*/ ,MEMO_FILD /*비고*/ ,AORX_FLAG /*AOR구분*/ ,INST_USID /*입력자*/ ,INST_DATE /*입력일*/ ,UPDT_USID /*수정자*/ ,UPDT_DATE /*수정일*/ ,PTAD_FLAG /*인쇄광고구분*/ ,MNDX_FLAG /*신문구분*/ ) VALUES ( #YEAR_MNTH# /*년월*/ ,(SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SEQX_FILD)), 0) + 1 FROM MD_PTMDXM WHERE YEAR_MNTH = #YEAR_MNTH#) /*일련번호*/ ,#CUST_CODE# /*광고주코드*/ ,#CTIM_CODE# /*광고주팀코드*/ ,#BRND_CODE# /*브랜드코드*/ ,#MEDX_CODE# /*청구지코드*/ ,#RMED_CODE# /*매체코드*/ ,#MEDX_FLAG# /*매체구분*/ ,#APLY_DATE# /*적용일자*/ ,#MATT_NAME# /*소재명*/ ,#EMPL_CODE# /*사원코드*/ ,#DEPT_CODE# /*부서코드*/ ,#PUBL_DATE# /*게재일*/ ,#MNDY_FLAG# /*월일간구분*/ ,#PUBL_PAGE# /*광고페이지*/ ,#COLR_DEGR# /*색도*/ ,#PUBL_FACE# /*게재면*/ ,#STDR_CTMT# /*규격_CM*/ ,#STDR_STEP# /*규격_단*/ ,#STDR_ETCX# /*규격_기타*/ ,#AMNT_FILD# /*광고비*/ ,TRUNC(#COMI_FILD#) /*수수료*/ ,#COMI_RATE# /*수수료율*/ ,#TRTX_FLAG# /*위수탁부가세유무*/ ,#CMTX_FLAG# /*수수료부가세유무*/ ,#TRTR_NUMB# /*위수탁거래명세서번호*/ ,#TRTX_NUMB# /*위수탁세금계산서번호*/ ,#TRCH_NUMB# /*위수탁임시전표번호*/ ,#CMTR_NUMB# /*수수료거래명세서번호*/ ,#CMTX_NUMB# /*수수료세금계산서번호*/ ,#CMCH_NUMB# /*수수료임시전표번호*/ ,#MEMO_FILD# /*비고*/ ,#AORX_FLAG# /*AOR구분*/ ,#INST_USID# /*입력자*/ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*입력일*/ ,#UPDT_USID# /*수정자*/ ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI:SS') /*입력일*/ ,#PTAD_FLAG# /*인쇄광고구분*/ ,#MNDX_FLAG# /*신문구분*/ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MD_PTMDXM /* MDMC0010.UPDATE00 인쇄 개별청약 수정*/ SET YEAR_MNTH = #YEAR_MNTH# /*년월*/ ,CUST_CODE = #CUST_CODE# /*광고주코드*/ ,CTIM_CODE = #CTIM_CODE# /*광고주팀코드*/ ,BRND_CODE = #BRND_CODE# /*브랜드코드*/ ,MEDX_CODE = #MEDX_CODE# /*청구지코드*/ ,RMED_CODE = #RMED_CODE# /*매체코드*/ ,MEDX_FLAG = #MEDX_FLAG# /*매체구분*/ ,APLY_DATE = #APLY_DATE# /*적용일자*/ ,MATT_NAME = #MATT_NAME# /*소재명*/ ,EMPL_CODE = #EMPL_CODE# /*사원코드*/ ,DEPT_CODE = #DEPT_CODE# /*부서코드*/ ,PUBL_DATE = #PUBL_DATE# /*게재일*/ ,MNDY_FLAG = #MNDY_FLAG# /*월일간구분*/ ,PUBL_PAGE = #PUBL_PAGE# /*광고페이지*/ ,COLR_DEGR = #COLR_DEGR# /*색도*/ ,PUBL_FACE = #PUBL_FACE# /*게재면*/ ,STDR_CTMT = #STDR_CTMT# /*규격_CM*/ ,STDR_ETCX = #STDR_ETCX# /*규격_기타*/ ,STDR_STEP = #STDR_STEP# /*규격_단*/ ,AMNT_FILD = #AMNT_FILD# /*광고비*/ ,COMI_FILD = TRUNC(#COMI_FILD#) /*수수료*/ ,COMI_RATE = #COMI_RATE# /*수수료율*/ ,TRTX_FLAG = #TRTX_FLAG# /*위수탁부가세*/ ,CMTX_FLAG = #CMTX_FLAG# /*수수료부가세*/ ,TRTR_NUMB = #TRTR_NUMB# /*위수탁거래명세서번호*/ ,TRTX_NUMB = #TRTX_NUMB# /*위수탁세금계산서번호*/ ,TRCH_NUMB = #TRCH_NUMB# /*위수탁임시전표번호*/ ,CMTR_NUMB = #CMTR_NUMB# /*수수료거래명세서번호*/ ,CMTX_NUMB = #CMTX_NUMB# /*수수료세금계산서번호*/ ,CMCH_NUMB = #CMCH_NUMB# /*수수료임시전표번호*/ ,MEMO_FILD = #MEMO_FILD# /*비고*/ ,AORX_FLAG = #AORX_FLAG# /*AOR구분*/ ,UPDT_USID = #UPDT_USID# /*수정자*/ ,UPDT_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') /*수정일*/ ,PTAD_FLAG = #PTAD_FLAG# /*인쇄광고구분*/ ,MNDX_FLAG = #MNDX_FLAG# /*신문구분*/ WHERE SEQX_FILD = #SEQX_FILD# /*일련번호*/ AND YEAR_MNTH = #YEAR_MNTH# /*년월*/ AND TRTR_NUMB IS NULL /*위수탁거래명세서번호*/ AND TRTX_NUMB IS NULL /*위수탁세금계산서번호*/ AND TRCH_NUMB IS NULL /*위수탁임시전표번호*/ AND CMTR_NUMB IS NULL /*수수료거래명세서번호*/ AND CMTX_NUMB IS NULL /*수수료세금계산서번호*/ AND CMCH_NUMB IS NULL /*수수료임시전표번호*/
